content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s sunshower cotton 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is 159 yards/ 100 grams approximately 315 total yards required we used the colors heirloom white wood thrush and pink clover for our samples - us 8 5 mm 16- or 20-inch circular needles 2 - a set of us 6 4 mm double pointed needles 3 - removable stitch markers 4 including one unique - optional scrap yarn and crochet hook 5 for provisional cast on gauge 24 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size - finished circumference 21 inches - finished height 12 inches - finished strap width ¾ inches - finished strap length 22 inches - finished handle drop 11 inches note these dimensions are after blocking and before use height and width tend to grow with use designed for purl soho by julia adams 6 julia loves the combination of math science and art that s necessary for designing she comes from a long line of obsessive knitters and has spent years finding the perfect balance between practicality and beauty in her designs we call that the art of knitting all images ©️ copyright purl soho for more information see https //www purlsoho com/create/2024/05/20/kit-caboodle-tote/ 1 https //www purlsoho com/sunshower-cotton html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html collection_filter=23796&type_filter=902 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html collection_filter=964&type_filter=902 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions html collection_filter=23805&type_filter=902 6 https //www juliaadams co uk/
